jcr:content.jcr:description: Download Adobe Illustrator CC graphic design software when you get started with Creative Cloud. Start your free trial today!
jcr:content.jcr:title: Project Felix
jcr:content.browserTitle: Project Felix from Adobe | 2D and 3D compositing design tools
jcr:content.metaDescription: Project Felix from Adobe is a set of 2D and 3D compositing design tools with an approachable, modern interface for easy compositing of photorealistic graphics.

promo.notifyIntroText: Sign up for an invite to the private beta, coming soon to Mac OS X and Windows 10.

textandimage2col_912.description: Composite 3D and 2D assets into photorealistic images without a steep learning curve or complex workflow. Just drag and drop a 3D model, material, and light into your scene. Then choose your background image. Project Felix automatically detects the horizon line and provides gridlines to help you align and place your model. The app can even use your background image to generate the right lighting.
textandimage2col_912.title: No 3D experience? No problem.

textandimage2col_359.altText: Free starter library in Adobe Stock
textandimage2col_359.description: Project Felix comes with a free starter library of models, materials, and lights to help you get going the moment you open the app. You can also search and license 3D and 2D assets from Adobe Stock, and then save them to your Adobe Creative Cloud Libraries to work with in Project Felix.
textandimage2col_359.title: Set the scene with Adobe Stock.

textandimage2col_fd8.description: With Project Felix, you can preview your design as you go. Experiment and edit your ideas without having to render a final image to see your work. You can also enlarge the preview window to see details up close. When you’re ready, render your design into a high-quality asset you can save and then open in Adobe Photoshop CC to refine further.
textandimage2col_fd8.title: See it in real time.

textandimage2col_3ce.description: Play. Explore. Experiment. Project Felix makes it easy. Use selection and camera tools to change angles and perspective. Buttons, sliders, and setting options let you stylize details like the glossiness of the material and the intensity of the light. Project Felix makes automatic adjustments as you go.
textandimage2col_3ce.title: Let Project Felix do the work.

text_63c9.text:
Work with us to make Project Felix better.

We’ve created Project Felix specifically for graphic designers. Your input is important to our design process. Let us know how we can make the app even more intuitive so it fits naturally with your existing workflows.
Now available for macOS and Windows 10.
 
See system requirements ›
Join the community forum ›

text_ee10.text: News and insights from the Project Felix team.

text_3220.text:
Make it. Creative Cloud.

Project Felix is part of Creative Cloud, which also includes Adobe Photoshop CC, Illustrator CC, and all our other amazing creative apps. It’s everything you need to turn your brightest ideas into your best work and share it with the world.

text.text:
The world's best imaging and design app is at the core of almost every creative project. Create and enhance photographs and other 2D and 3D images, design incredible artwork and even edit video content.
Learn about Photoshop ›

image.alt: Felix makes it easy to composite 2D and 3D assets

article.text: Create high-quality, photorealistic images. Project Felix makes it easy to composite 2D and 3D assets to build product shots, scene visualizations, and abstract art. And it’s made for graphic designers, not 3D experts. This is an initial beta release — stay tuned for more exciting features coming soon.
article.title: You already think in 3D. Now design in it.

credits.title: Paradise in the future - 25 Years of Photoshop
